jira_orchestrator_delegation.overview:
The project online Code mode delegates ALL Jira operations to Orchestrator mode.
Complete delegation pattern defined in: ../../sdlc/shared/jira-orchestrator-delegation-pattern.md

automatic_status_updates_reference.note:
When code implementation is complete, Orchestrator handles: 1. Creating merge request (see mr-creation-workflow.md) 2. Linking MR to JIRA ticket 3. Transitioning status to "In Review"
Code mode focuses on implementation; Orchestrator handles MR creation and status updates.

supersedes_previous_implementation.reason: Previous partial implementation only updated status without: - Assigning user to ticket - Validating Story Points for Stories - Following complete Orchestrator workflow
supersedes_previous_implementation.migration: Delegation approach ensures Code mode benefits from Orchestrator's comprehensive Jira integration without duplicating logic.
